top_banner.title: Explore the Timeless Legacy of Mleiha
top_banner.description: Mleiha, a UNESCO-nominated World Heritage Site in Sharjah, is a treasure trove of historical and archaeological significance. This region boasts Bronze Age tombs, pre-Islamic forts, and fascinating artifacts, such as pottery, iron tools, and camel skeletons. The picturesque setting of Mleiha, with its blend of history and natural beauty, provides the perfect backdrop for the Tanweer Festival, enhancing the spiritual and cultural experience for all attendees.

activities.title: Valley of the Caves
activities.description: Discover the geological wonders of Fossil Rock, adorned with marine fossils, offering a glimpse into Earth's ancient past.

activities.title: Moongazing
activities.description: Enjoy an enchanting night of stargazing under Mleiha’s expansive sky, embracing the universe and its timeless wonders.

activities.title: Mleiha Archaeological Center
activities.description: Delve into Mleiha's captivating history and uncover the secrets of ancient artifacts and archaeological sites.

activities.title: Horse Riding
activities.description: Embark on a thrilling horse riding adventure across the desert, exploring the mesmerizing beauty of Mleiha.

activities.title: Mleiha Archaeological Tour
activities.description: Traverse history, exploring Stone Age caves, ancient forts, and Bronze Age secrets. Unearth the allure of camel graves and Mleiha Fort.

offer.title: AL BADAYER RETREAT
offer.description: Al Badayer recreates the experience of life as an ancient traveler along the Silk Road. This culturally stimulating stay is enhanced by the spellbinding sunrises and sunsets over the vast dunes

offer.title: Faya Retreat
offer.description: Al Faya Retreat is a luxurious desert escape in Sharjah, offering a unique blend of Bedouin-inspired hospitality and modern amenities. Nestled among the dunes, the retreat features five elegantly designed rooms, a hands-free spa, a saltwater pool, and opportunities for stargazing. Perfect for those seeking tranquility and cultural immersion in the heart of the desert.

offer.title: DoubleTree by Hilton
offer.description: DoubleTree by Hilton Sharjah Waterfront Hotel & Residences offers a luxurious stay in Sharjah with stunning views of the Al Majaz Waterfront. The hotel features spacious rooms and apartments, a fitness center, an indoor pool, and dining options catering to various tastes. Its prime location provides easy access to cultural attractions and business districts, making it ideal for both leisure and business travelers.

offer.title: MOON RETREAT
offer.description: Tucked away among the desert dunes, Moon Retreat presents a glamping experience that is distinguished by its simplicity, adventure and privacy. Perfect for couples and families, Moon Retreat gives you the chance to explore the Mleiha desert by day and spend the evenings star-gazing. This is a great place to refresh your mind and rejuvenate your senses.
